thread.section_title: Novotel New York Times Square - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Great location
thread.title_full: Great location - Review of Novotel New York Times Square, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: TheFeeNix
title: Great location
text: The hotel is located to the north of Times Square. You are far enough away to be set apart from but close enough to the action. It has a nice roof top patio that overlooks Time Square and the buildings to the west. A nice place to have a relaxing meal or cocktail. The rooms are good sized for New York City; offering a contemporary theme.
